result.eng: We spent a year and a half doing that work.
result.ga: Chaith muid bliain go leith i mbun na hoibre

result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ muid bliain go leiṫ i mbun na hoibreWe spent a year and a half doing that work.

result.eng: I spent a year doing that work.
result.ga: Chaith mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sin
result.orig: Chaith mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sin
result.html: Chaith mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sinI spent a year doing that work.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé bliain i mbun na hoibre sinI spent a year doing that work.

result.eng: She spent her whole life doing that work.
result.ga: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.orig: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.html: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sinShe spent her whole life doing that work.

result.eng: I am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.
result.ga: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibre
result.orig: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibre
result.html: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibreI am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gailliṁ inniu tar éis na hoibreI am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.

result.eng: I'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.
result.ga: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhó
result.orig: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhó
